components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Altan Redes in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altan Redes in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altan Redes in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altan Redes in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Reports Delays to Xphone Network in Israel

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Xphone Network in Israel. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Xphone Network in Israel. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Xphone Network in Israel. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery report delays. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Outbound Call Failure To a Subset Of Hungary Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungary phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungary phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are observing a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are observing a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are observing a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls failing to Hungry. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 16 October 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 16 October 2025 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 October 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 17 October 2025 at 17:35 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboard visualization partner in the US will be conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, Oct 18th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is expected to last up to three hours. During this time, there may be intermittent failures when loading Insights Historical Dashboards or performing ETL uploads.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights
